{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Social Media Content Creator",
  "description": "Fabwellness Limited is a premier herbal supplement brand dedicated to helping women achieve their health and hormonal balance goals. With a thriving online community and a physical store in Lagos, we are looking for a creative storyteller to bring our products to life through engaging visual content.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Content Creator

Job Location:&nbsp;Ogba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time (Hybrid)
Work Schedule:&nbsp;Minimum of 3 days in-office

Job Description


	We are seeking a female Content Creator who is passionate about wellness, understands social media trends, and can turn supplement education into &quot;scroll-stopping&quot; content.


Job Summary


	The Content Creator will be responsible for the end-to-end production of social media content. This is a hybrid role that requires you to be at our Ogba office at least 3 days a week to shoot with physical products, document the store environment, and collaborate with the team.
	You will be the creative voice behind our TikTok, Instagram, and Facebook pages.


Key Responsibilities


	Content Production: Conceptualize, shoot, and edit high-quality short-form videos (Reels, TikToks, YouTube Shorts) and photos.
	On-Camera Presence: Confidently appear in videos to demonstrate product use, share wellness tips, or jump on relevant trends.
	Editing: Use tools like CapCut, InShot, or Adobe Premiere to create polished, energetic, and professional videos.
	Trend Spotting: Stay ahead of social media trends, viral sounds, and new features to keep the brand relevant.
	Brand Storytelling: Translate complex herbal supplement benefits into simple, relatable, and aesthetic content for our female audience.
	Collaboration: Work with the marketing team to align content with monthly sales goals and product launches.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an HND / B.Sc Degree with 1-4 years experience.
	Experience: Proven experience as a Content Creator, Videographer, or Social Media Manager (please provide a portfolio or links to your work).
	Technical Skills: Expert-level skills in mobile video editing (CapCut is a must) and graphic design (Canva).
	Equipment: Must have a high-quality smartphone camera and knowledge of basic lighting/audio for video.
	Creativity: A &quot;vibe-focused&quot; eye for aesthetics and the ability to write catchy captions and hooks.
	Communication: Excellent command of English and Pidgin (to relate with our diverse Nigerian audience).
	Proximity: Ability to commute to Ogba, Lagos, at least 3 times a week.
	Gender Preference: Female (Due to the nature of our products and target audience)


Salary
Salary: N120,000 - N150,000 / Month based on the quality of your portfolio and experience.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV and a link to their Portfolio (or a 1-minute video introducing themselves) to:&nbsp;fabwellness.co25@gmail.com&nbsp;using &quot;Content Creator - Ogba&quot; as the subject of the mail.",
  "datePosted": "2026-01-09",
  "validThrough": "2026-01-21",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Fabwellness Limited"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Lagos",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "192791"
  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",
    "value": {
      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 75000,
      "maxValue": 150000,
      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



Social Media Content Creator Job at Fabwellness Limited




        
    

        
        Fabwellness Limited is a premier herbal supplement brand dedicated to helping women achieve their health and hormonal balance goals. With a thriving online community and a physical store in Lagos, we are looking for a creative storyteller to bring our products to life through engaging visual content.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Content Creator

Job Location: Ogba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time (Hybrid)
Work Schedule: Minimum of 3 days in-office

Job Description
     

            
    




	We are seeking a female Content Creator who is passionate about wellness, understands social media trends, and can turn supplement education into "scroll-stopping" content.


Job Summary


	The Content Creator will be responsible for the end-to-end production of social media content. This is a hybrid role that requires you to be at our Ogba office at least 3 days a week to shoot with physical products, document the store environment, and collaborate with the team.
	You will be the creative voice behind our TikTok, Instagram, and Facebook pages.


Key Responsibilities


	Content Production: Conceptualize, shoot, and edit high-quality short-form videos (Reels, TikToks, YouTube Shorts) and photos.
	On-Camera Presence: Confidently appear in videos to demonstrate product use, share wellness tips, or jump on relevant trends.
	Editing: Use tools like CapCut, InShot, or Adobe Premiere to create polished, energetic, and professional videos.
	Trend Spotting: Stay ahead of social media trends, viral sounds, and new features to keep the brand relevant.
	Brand Storytelling: Translate complex herbal supplement benefits into simple, relatable, and aesthetic content for our female audience.
	Collaboration: Work with the marketing team to align content with monthly sales goals and product launches.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an HND / B.Sc Degree with 1-4 years experience.
	Experience: Proven experience as a Content Creator, Videographer, or Social Media Manager (please provide a portfolio or links to your work).
	Technical Skills: Expert-level skills in mobile video editing (CapCut is a must) and graphic design (Canva).
	Equipment: Must have a high-quality smartphone camera and knowledge of basic lighting/audio for video.
	Creativity: A "vibe-focused" eye for aesthetics and the ability to write catchy captions and hooks.
	Communication: Excellent command of English and Pidgin (to relate with our diverse Nigerian audience).
	Proximity: Ability to commute to Ogba, Lagos, at least 3 times a week.
	Gender Preference: Female (Due to the nature of our products and target audience)


Salary
Salary: N120,000 - N150,000 / Month based on the quality of your portfolio and experience.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV and a link to their Portfolio (or a 1-minute video introducing themselves) to: fabwellness.co25@gmail.com using "Content Creator - Ogba" as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

Graphic Designer (Volunteer) Job at Free Future Foundation




        
    

        
        At the Free Future Foundation, we empower Nigerian youths with the knowledge, skills, and resources to champion freedom. Through education, advocacy, and public campaigns, we aim to cultivate a generation that drives positive change and shapes a brighter future for Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Graphic Designer (Volunteer)

Job Location: Nigeria

Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications and experience.
    

    

        Click here to Apply
